title: "Navigators" by Mike Meginnis
description: A father and son become immersed in a video game with a unusual philosophical goal -- one that's unlike any game they've played before. "Navigators" appears in THE BEST AMERICAN SHORT STORIES 2012. Thanks to our presenting sponsor Audible. Start your free trial and get a free audiobook at audible.com/levar.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
